full_summary:
#Government Tender Announcement
## Competitive Request for Proposal: Forensic Child Interviewing Workshops

### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number:** M5000-23-05568/A
* **Notice Release Date:** September 26, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** October 20, 2023, 4:00 PM CDT
* **Contracting Entity:** Royal Canadian Mounted Police
* **Project Location:** Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada

### Brief Description

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites proposals from qualified contractors to deliver forensic child interviewing workshops in Manitoba. The workshops will be scheduled on an "as-and-when requested" basis during the contract period.

### Tender Requirements

* The proposed contract period will be for 18 months, with an irrevocable option to extend for up to two additional one-year periods.
* The selected contractor must meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive.
* Bids must be submitted as per the attached Request for Proposal (RFP) documents.

### Evaluation Criteria

The RCMP will evaluate bids based on their ability to meet the technical requirements of the project, as outlined in the RFP documents. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award.

### Security Clearance

This solicitation contains a security requirement. The selected contractor must have the necessary security clearance to access sensitive information.

### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: October 20, 2023, 4:00 PM CDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: [To be determined]
* Expected Contract End Date: [To be determined]

### Attachments

The RFP documents, including the contract terms and conditions, can be downloaded from [CanadaBuys website] (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).

### Contact Information

For general inquiries, please contact Shawn Balaski at shawn.m.balaski@rcmp-grc.gc.ca or (780) 670-8592.
